get.description: Fetches the status of an operation such as triggering a backup, restore. The status can be in progress, completed or failed. get.description: Provides the information of the backed up data identified using RecoveryPointID. This is an asynchronous operation. To know the status of the operation, call the GetProtectedItemOperationResult API.

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: Client Api Version.

parameters.name: vaultName
parameters.description: The name of the recovery services vault.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group where the recovery services vault is present.

parameters.description: Fabric name associated with backed up item.

parameters.name: containerName
parameters.description: Container name associated with backed up item.

parameters.name: protectedItemName
parameters.description: Backed up item name whose backup data needs to be fetched.

parameters.name: recoveryPointId
parameters.description: RecoveryPointID represents the backed up data to be fetched.

post.description: Provisions a script which invokes an iSCSI connection to the backup data. Executing this script opens a file explorer displaying all the recoverable files and folders. This is an asynchronous operation. To know the status of provisioning, call GetProtectedItemOperationResult API.

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: Client Api Version.

parameters.name: vaultName
parameters.description: The name of the recovery services vault.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group where the recovery services vault is present.

parameters.name: subscriptionId
parameters.description: The subscription Id.

parameters.name: fabricName
parameters.description: Fabric name associated with the backed up items.

parameters.name: containerName
parameters.description: Container name associated with the backed up items.

parameters.name: protectedItemName
parameters.description: Backed up item name whose files/folders are to be restored.

parameters.name: recoveryPointId
parameters.description: Recovery point ID which represents backed up data. iSCSI connection will be provisioned for this backed up data.

post.description: Restores the specified backed up data. This is an asynchronous operation. To know the status of this API call, use GetProtectedItemOperationResult API.

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: Client Api Version.

parameters.name: vaultName

parameters.name: containerName
parameters.description: Container name associated with the backed up items.

parameters.name: protectedItemName
parameters.description: Backed up item to be restored.

parameters.name: recoveryPointId
parameters.description: Recovery point ID which represents the backed up data to be restored.

post.description: Revokes an iSCSI connection which can be used to download a script. Executing this script opens a file explorer displaying all recoverable files and folders. This is an asynchronous operation.

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: Client Api Version.

parameters.name: vaultName

parameters.name: containerName
parameters.description: Container name associated with the backed up items.

parameters.name: protectedItemName
parameters.description: Backed up item name whose files/folders are to be restored.

parameters.name: recoveryPointId
parameters.description: Recovery point ID which represents backed up data. iSCSI connection will be revoked for this backed up data.

get.description: Provides the status of the delete operations such as deleting backed up item. Once the operation has started, the status code in the response would be Accepted. It will continue to be in this state till it reaches completion. On successful completion, the status code will be OK. This method expects OperationID as an argument. OperationID is part of the Location header of the operation response.

DPMServers.description: List of BackupEngines protecting the container

canReRegister.description: Specifies whether the container is re-registrable.

protectedItemCount.description: Number of protected items in the BackupEngine

AzureBackupServerEngine.description: Backup engine type when Azure Backup Server is used to manage the backups.

AzureIaaSClassicComputeVMContainer.description: IaaS VM workload-specific backup item representing a classic virtual machine.

AzureIaaSClassicComputeVMProtectableItem.description: IaaS VM workload-specific backup item representing the Classic Compute VM.

AzureIaaSClassicComputeVMProtectedItem.description: IaaS VM workload-specific backup item representing the Classic Compute VM.

AzureIaaSComputeVMContainer.description: IaaS VM workload-specific backup item representing an Azure Resource Manager virtual machine.

AzureIaaSComputeVMProtectableItem.description: IaaS VM workload-specific backup item representing the Azure Resource Manager VM.

AzureIaaSComputeVMProtectedItem.description: IaaS VM workload-specific backup item representing the Azure Resource Manager VM.

AzureIaaSVMHealthDetails.description: Azure IaaS VM workload-specific Health Details.

friendlyName.description: Friendly name of the VM represented by this backup item.

healthDetails.description: Health details on this backup item.

lastBackupStatus.description: Last backup operation status. Possible values: Healthy, Unhealthy.

lastBackupTime.description: Timestamp of the last backup operation on this backup item.

protectedItemDataId.description: Data ID of the protected item.

protectionState.description: Backup state of this backup item.

protectionStatus.description: Backup status of this backup item.

virtualMachineId.description: Fully qualified ARM ID of the virtual machine represented by this item.

oldestRecoveryPoint.description: The oldest backup copy available for this backup item.

policyInconsistent.description: Specifies if backup policy associated with the backup item is inconsistent.

recoveryPointCount.description: Number of backup copies available for this backup item.

AzureIaaSVMProtectedItemExtendedInfo.description: Additional information on Azure IaaS VM specific backup item.

timeZone.description: TimeZone optional input as string. For example: TimeZone = "Pacific Standard Time".

protectedItemDataId.description: Internal ID of a backup item. Used by Azure SQL Backup engine to contact Recovery Services.

protectionState.description: Backup state of the backed up item.

oldestRecoveryPoint.description: The oldest backup copy available for this item in the service.

policyState.description: State of the backup policy associated with this backup item.

recoveryPointCount.description: Number of available backup copies associated with this backup item.

AzureSqlProtectedItemExtendedInfo.description: Additional information on Azure Sql specific protected item.

secretVaultId.description: ID of the Key Vault where this Secret is stored.

BMSBackupEngineQueryObject.description: Query parameters to fetch list of backup engines.

backupManagementType.description: Backup management type for the backup engine.

friendlyName.description: Friendly name of the backup engine.

BMSBackupEnginesQueryObject.description: Query parameters to fetch list of backup engines.

type.description: Backup management type for this container.

BMSBackupSummariesQueryObject.description: Query parameters to fetch backup summaries.

backupManagementType.description: Backup management type for this container.

status.description: Status of registration of this container with the Recovery Services Vault.

BMSContainerQueryObject.description: The query filters that can be used with the list containers API.

BMSPOQueryObject.description: Filters to list items that can be backed up.

endDate.description: Backup copies created before this time.

startDate.description: Backup copies created after this time.

backupEngineState.description: Status of the backup engine with the Recovery Services Vault. = {Active/Deleting/DeleteFailed}

backupManagementType.description: Type of backup management for the backup engine.

canReRegister.description: Flag indicating if the backup engine be registered, once already registered.

friendlyName.description: Friendly name of the backup engine.

healthStatus.description: Backup status of the backup engine.

isAzureBackupAgentUpgradeAvailable.description: To check if backup agent upgrade available

isDPMUpgradeAvailable.description: To check if backup engine upgrade available

registrationStatus.description: Registration status of the backup engine with the Recovery Services Vault.

BackupEngineBase.description: The base backup engine class. All workload specific backup engines derive from this class.

BackupEngineBaseResource.description: The base backup engine class. All workload specific backup engines derive from this class.

availableDiskSpace.description: Diskspace currently available in the backup engine.

azureProtectedInstances.description: Protected instances in the backup engine.

diskCount.description: Number of disks in the backup engine.

protectedItemsCount.description: Number of protected items in the backup engine.

protectedServersCount.description: Number of protected servers in the backup engine.

refreshedAt.description: Last refresh time in the backup engine.

usedDiskSpace.description: Diskspace used in the backup engine.

BackupManagementUsage.description: Backup management usages of a vault.

value.description: The list of backup management usages for the given vault.

objectType.description: This property will be used as the discriminator for deciding the specific types in the polymorhpic chain of types.

BackupRequest.description: Base class for backup request. Workload-specific backup requests are derived from this class.

BackupRequestResource.description: Base class for backup request. Workload-specific backup requests are derived from this class.

storageTypeState.description: Locked or Unlocked. Once a machine is registered against a resource, the storageTypeState is always Locked.
Locked or Unlocked. Once a machine is registered against a resource, the storageTypeState is always Locked.

osType.description: OS type - Windows, Linux etc. for which this file / folder restore client script works.

scriptContent.description: File content of the client script for file / folder restore.

scriptExtension.description: File extension of the client script for file / folder restore - .ps1 , .sh , etc.

scriptNameSuffix.description:
Mandator suffix that should be added to the name of script that is given for download to user.
            If its null or empty then , ignore it.

url.description: URL of Executable from where to source the content. If this is not null then ScriptContent should not be used

ClientScriptForConnect.description: Client script details for file / folder restore.

lastRefreshedAt.description: Last refresh time of the DPMContainer.

backupEngineName.description: Backup Management server protecting this backup item

friendlyName.description: Friendly name of the managed item

isScheduledForDeferredDelete.description: To check if backup item is scheduled for deferred delete

DPMProtectedItem.description: Additional information on Backup engine specific backup item.

isCollocated.description: To check if backup item is collocated.

isPresentOnCloud.description: To check if backup item is cloud protected.

lastBackupStatus.description: Last backup status information on backup item.

lastRefreshedAt.description: Last refresh time on backup item.

protectableObjectLoadPath.description: Attribute to provide information on various DBs.

protected.description: To check if backup item is disk protected.

protectionGroupName.description: Protection group name of the backup item.

DPMProtectedItemExtendedInfo.description: Additional information of DPM Protected item.

daysOfTheMonth.description: List of days of the month.

isLast.description: Whether Date is last date of month

DpmBackupEngine.description: Data Protection Manager (DPM) specific backup engine.

DPMServers.description: List of BackupEngines protecting the container

canReRegister.description: Specifies whether the container is re-registrable.

protectedItemCount.description: Number of protected items in the BackupEngine

encryptionEnabled.description: Identifies whether this backup copy represents an encrypted VM at the time of backup.

kekVaultId.description: ID of Key Vault where KEK is stored.

secretKeyVaultId.description: ID of Key Vault where Secret is stored.

EncryptionDetails.description: Details needed if the VM was encrypted at the time of backup.

blobSasKey.description: SAS key to access the blob. It expires in 15 mins.

blobUrl.description: URL of the blob into which the serialized string of list of jobs is exported.

ExportJobsOperationResultInfo.description: This class is used to send blob details after exporting jobs.

friendlyName.description: Friendly name of the backup copy.

recoveryPointAdditionalInfo.description: Additional information associated with this backup copy.

recoveryPointTime.description: Time at which this backup copy was created.

expand.description: Specifies if the additional information should be provided for this item.

objectType.description: This property will be used as the discriminator for deciding the specific types in the polymorhpic chain of types.

resourceGroup.description: Resource group name of Recovery Services Vault.

virtualMachineId.description: Fully qualified ARM url of the virtual machine represented by this Azure IaaS VM container.

virtualMachineVersion.description: Specifies whether the container represents a Classic or an Azure Resource Manager VM.

virtualMachineId.description: Fully qualified ARM ID of the virtual machine.

recoveryPointExpiryTimeInUTC.description: Backup copy will expire after the time specified (UTC).

recoveryPointId.description: ID of the IaaS VM backup copy from where the files/folders have to be restored.

renewExistingRegistration.description: Whether to renew existing registration with the iSCSI server.

virtualMachineId.description: Fully qualified ARM ID of the virtual machine whose the files / folders have to be restored.

IaasVMILRRegistrationRequest.description: Restore files/folders from a backup copy of IaaS VM.

isInstantILRSessionActive.description: Is the session to recover items from this backup copy still active.

isManagedVirtualMachine.description: Whether VM is with Managed Disks

isSourceVMEncrypted.description: Identifies whether the VM was encrypted when the backup copy is created.

recoveryPointAdditionalInfo.description: Additional information associated with this backup copy.

recoveryPointTime.description: Time at which this backup copy was created.

sourceVMStorageType.description: Storage type of the VM whose backup copy is created.

IaasVMRecoveryPoint.description: IaaS VM workload specific backup copy.

affinityGroup.description: Affinity group associated to VM to be restored. Used only for Classic Compute Virtual Machines.

createNewCloudService.description: Should a new cloud service be created while restoring the VM. If this is false, VM will be restored to the same cloud service as it was at the time of backup.

recoveryPointId.description: ID of the backup copy to be recovered.

region.description: Region in which the virtual machine is restored.

sourceResourceId.description: Fully qualified ARM ID of the VM which is being recovered.

storageAccountId.description: Fully qualified ARM ID of the storage account to which the VM has to be restored.

subnetId.description: Subnet ID, is the subnet ID associated with the to be restored VM. For Classic VMs it would be {VnetID}/Subnet/{SubnetName} and, for the Azure Resource Manager VMs it would be ARM resource ID used to represent the subnet.

targetDomainNameId.description: Fully qualified ARM ID of the domain name to be associated to the VM being restored. This applies only to Classic Virtual Machines.

targetResourceGroupId.description:
This is the ARM Id of the resource group that you want to create for this Virtual machine and other artifacts.
            For e.g. /subscriptions/{subId}/resourcegroups/{rg}

targetVirtualMachineId.description:
This is the complete ARM Id of the VM that will be created.
            For e.g. /subscriptions/{subId}/resourcegroups/{rg}/provider/Microsoft.Compute/virtualmachines/{vm}

virtualNetworkId.description:
This is the virtual network Id of the vnet that will be attached to the virtual machine.
            User will be validated for join action permissions in the linked access.

InstantItemRecoveryTarget.description: Target details for file / folder restore.

backupManagementType.description: Type of backup managmenent for the job.

endTime.description: Job has ended at this time. Value is in UTC.

startTime.description: Job has started at this time. Value is in UTC.

keyVaultId.description: Key Vault ID where this Key is stored.

KEKDetails.description: KEK is encryption key for BEK.

KeyAndSecretDetails.description:
BEK is bitlocker key.
            KEK is encryption key for BEK
            If the VM was encrypted then we will store follwing details :
            1. Secret(BEK) - Url + Backup Data + vaultId.
            2. Key(KEK) - Url + Backup Data + vaultId.
            BEK and KEK can potentiallty have different vault ids.

canReRegister.description: Can the container be registered one more time.

protectedItemCount.description: Number of items backed up in this container.

MabContainer.description: Container with items backed up using MAB backup engine.

backupItemType.description: Type of backup items associated with this container.

backupItems.description: List of backup items associated with this container.

lastBackupStatus.description: Latest backup status of this container.

lastRefreshedAt.description: Time stamp when this container was refreshed.

policyName.description: Backup policy associated with this container.

computerName.description: Name of the computer associated with this backup item.

friendlyName.description: Friendly name of this backup item.

isScheduledForDeferredDelete.description: Specifies if the item is scheduled for deferred deletion.

lastRefreshedAt.description: Last time when the agent data synced to service.

recoveryPointCount.description: Number of backup copies associated with the backup item.

MabFileFolderProtectedItemExtendedInfo.description: Additional information on the backed up item.

retentionScheduleFormatType.description: Retention schedule format type for monthly retention policy.

jobList.description: List of jobs created by this operation.

jobIds.description: IDs of the jobs created for the protected item.

OperationStatusJobsExtendedInfo.description: Operation status extended info for list of jobs.

statusCode.description: HTTP Status Code of the operation.

OperationWorkerResponse.description: This is the base class for operation result responses.

backupManagementType.description: Type of backup managemenent for the backed up item.

lastRecoveryPoint.description: Timestamp when the last (latest) backup copy was created for this backup item.

policyId.description: ID of the backup policy with which this item is backed up.

sourceResourceId.description: ARM ID of the resource to be backed up.

workloadType.description: Type of workload this item represents.

backupManagementType.description: Backup management type for the backed up item.

healthState.description: Health State for the backed up item.

itemType.description: Type of workload this item represents.

policyName.description: Backup policy name associated with the backup item.

backupManagementType.description: Type of backup managemenent for the container.

containerType.description: Type of the container. The value of this property for: 1. Compute Azure VM is Microsoft.Compute/virtualMachines 2. Classic Compute Azure VM is Microsoft.ClassicCompute/virtualMachines 3. Windows machines (like MAB, DPM etc) is Windows 4. Azure SQL instance is AzureSqlContainer.

healthStatus.description: Status of health of the container.

protectableObjectType.description: Type of the protectable object associated with this container.

registrationStatus.description: Status of registration of the container with the Recovery Services Vault.

id.description: Resource Id represents the complete path to the resource.

name.description: Resource name associated with the resource.

type.description: Resource type represents the complete path of the form Namespace/ResourceType/ResourceType/...

nextLink.description: The uri to fetch the next page of resources. Call ListNext() fetches next page of resources.

ResourceList.description: Base for all lists of resources.

objectType.description: This property will be used as the discriminator for deciding the specific types in the polymorhpic chain of types.

count.description:
Count of duration types. Retention duration is obtained by the counting the duration type Count times. 
            For example, when Count = 3 and DurationType = Weeks, retention duration will be three weeks.

durationType.description: Retention duration type of retention policy.

retentionPolicyType.description: This property will be used as the discriminator for deciding the specific types in the polymorhpic chain of types.

schedulePolicyType.description: This property will be used as the discriminator for deciding the specific types in the polymorhpic chain of types.

scheduleRunDays.description: List of days of week this schedule has to be run.

scheduleRunFrequency.description: Frequency of the schedule operation of this policy.

scheduleRunTimes.description: List of times of day this schedule has to be run.

scheduleWeeklyFrequency.description: At every number weeks this schedule has to be run.

daysOfTheWeek.description: List of days of the week.
List of days of week for weekly retention policy.

backupManagementType.description: Type of backup managemenent to backup an item.

friendlyName.description: Friendly name of the backup item.

protectionState.description: State of the back up item.

WorkloadProtectableItemResource.description: Base class for backup item. Workload-specific backup items are derived from this class.

monthsOfYear.description: List of months of year of yearly retention policy.

retentionScheduleFormatType.description: Retention schedule format for yearly retention policy.
